sn9.14:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu vihārati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe. Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā padumaṁ upasiṅghati. Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn9.14:3: "Na harāmi na bhañjāmi,ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṁ;Atha kena nu vaṇṇena,gandhatthenoti vuccati.
sn9.14:4: Yvāyaṁ bhisāni khanati,puṇḍarīkāni bhañjati;Evaṁ ākiṇṇakammanto,kasmā eso na vuccatī"ti.
sn9.14:5: "Ākiṇṇaluddo puriso,dhāticelaṁva makkhito;Tasmiṁ me vacanaṁ natthi,tvañcārahāmi vattave.
sn9.14:7: "Addhā maṁ yakkha jānāsi,atho me anukampasi;Punapi yakkha vajjāsi,yadā passasi edisan"ti.
sn9.14:8: "Neva taṁ upajīvāma,napi te bhatakāmhase;Tvameva bhikkhu jāneyya,yena gaccheyya suggatin"ti.
sn9.14:9: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
sn9.14:10: Vivekaṁ upaṭṭhānañca,Kassapagottena sambahulā;Ānando anuruddho ca,Nāgadattañca kulagharaṇī.
sn9.14:11: Vajjiputto ca vesālī,Sajjhāyena ayoniso;Majjhanhikālamhi pākatindriya—​Padumapupphena cuddasa bhaveti.
